results.name: I'm lost in the forest but I can jump and dash

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core I3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 9400 GT or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core I7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
